election_record.label: Vermont 1808 Governor

overview.note: The Official Results list Isaac Tichenor with 13634 total votes and Israel Smith with 12775 total votes, but the county totals add up to 13664 for Tichenor and 13022 for Smith.
The Virginia Gazette, November 1, and Freeman's Journal, October 25, list 12776 total votes for Israel Smith.
The National Intelligencer and Washington Advertiser (Washington, DC). November 2, 1808.
The Plebeian, November 1, lists 13614 total votes for Isaac Tichenor.

sub_unit.name: Addison
sub_unit.note: The Official Results list 1345 votes for Isaac Tichenor and 1168 for Israel Smith in Addison County, though the town votes listed add up to 1321 for Tichenor and 11153 for Smith.
The World, September 28, lists 1272 votes for Isaac Tichenor and 1114 for Israel Smith in Addison County.

The Middlebury Mercury (Middlebury, VT), September 14, lists 139 votes for Isaac Tichenor in Addison.
